name: Legend of Kunoichi
description:
Play as Mai, a ninja warrior, to defend your Shogun against waves of ninja attackers. Throwing hammers to take them out and hold them off as long as you can so your Shogun can escape.

Download Legend of Kunoichi™ today!

Playable on PS3™ and PSP® systems.


"PlayStation" and the "PS" Family logo are registered trademarks of Sony Computer Entertainment Inc.

If you do not wish to accept all of these terms, do not purchase or use this item. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 console systems and 2 portable systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
